emr_vis_nlp.ml.deprecated

Class RuntimeIndicatorPrediction

  • java.lang.Object
    • emr_vis_nlp.ml.deprecated.RuntimeIndicatorPrediction

  • public class RuntimeIndicatorPrediction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for building temporary datafiles and calling Phuong's back-end models for prediction of indicators. This class serves as an intermediary between the visualization and the back-end models.

      • resetDemo

      • buildListOfBOWTermAttrs

        public static void buildListOfBOWTermAttrs()
        Builds an ordered list of the terms that the backend model expects to see in an arff file. This should only need to be run whenever the backend models change in some way.

      • readListOfBOWTerms

        public static void readListOfBOWTerms()
        Reads list of terms (written by buildListOfBOWTermsAttrs) into memory. File should contain 1 term per line.

      • getTermWeightsForIndicator
